artist: Artist: Roberta Gregory; Printer: Morgan Printing, Grafton, N.D.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, image and text printed in color offset lithography on pink coated cover; 70 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
signed: Inside front cover, red and black marker: (figural doodle) / Roberta Gregory
title: Bitchy Strips!
